text: Creamy miso dressing #1 Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and creamy. Store in airtight container in refrigerator.  Stir before use. It will keep for approximately one week. Creamy miso dressing #2 Put the ingredients into the blender. Blend until smooth and creamy. Transfer to an airtight storage container. Keep in the refrigerator. Stir before use. Use within the week. Creamy miso dressing #3 Add the miso paste to the blender. Turn on the blender and slowly drizzle in the water. Blend to form a smooth paste. Add the remaining ingredients. Blend until smooth and creamy. Taste the dressing. Adjust any element you feel requires a different balance. Stir before use. If not using immediately, transfer to an airtight storage container and refrigerate.
